title: That person who wants to Baron
body:
Even when the entire team does not
https://33.media.tumblr.com/57fea4b275e0e0394cc5e27c86cbf354/tumblr_inline_n8la24vxBC1rm1jph.gif

replies.body:
"Guys, we got an ace and their mid tower and inhib are down. Now is the perfect time for Baron!"

http://sd.keepcalm-o-matic.co.uk/i/oh-really-i-don-t-think-so.png

And then in Heroes of the Storm it's, "Hey guys, we just got a mega kill... Let's take our sweet fucking time to get ALL the camps, boss included, and then push even though there's a huge minion wave at their base."

> [{quoted}](name=Squidsmastah,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hRH85Enr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-07T01:35:10.470+0000)
>
> And then in Heroes of the Storm it's, "Hey guys, we just got a mega kill... Let's take our sweet fucking time to get ALL the camps, boss included, and then push even though there's a huge minion wave at their base."

What is Heroes of the Storm? Is that another game? Do other games actually exist other than League of Legends? I thought that was the only thing I was allowed to play 40 hours a week for the last 2 years. O.O
Yes there's also DoTA, Smite, and TF2.
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-K3VlA58T2I8/UoDmb09hl6I/AAAAAAAABxA/Pctgap8z2zI/s1600/Not+like+the+other.png
http://i.imgur.com/W9XAXF1.jpg
http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lqp661V9ZO1r0mhfro1_500.gif

It's the Yang to League's Yin.

LoL: Amazing game, awful customer support, horrible IP system, ranked system, punishment system.
HoTS: Piece of shit game, super easy and fair to unlock every champion, better community.

> [{quoted}](name=FistOfSharkiesha,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hRH85Enr,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-07T23:22:52.781+0000)
>
> It's the Yang to League's Yin.
> 
> LoL: Amazing game, awful customer support, horrible IP system, ranked system, punishment system.
> HoTS: Piece of shit game, super easy and fair to unlock every champion, better community.

:/

I guess it is just opinion then. If anyone were to ever try to tell me that another MOBA was better, he or she never wins. Because it is all opinion. 

In all serious though, all we as a community ever do is complain. We never seem to really focus on what we truly love about this game.

I love the game itself. So good. Got me hooked since the day I started playing it 2 years ago.

I love ranked because it quenches the competitive side of me and gives me a chance to move up everyday. 

I love the esports scene of it because it gives me something to discuss and ideas to work off of. I can learn and man is it just awesome to watch. I went to the NA Finals and I never was so happy in my life to be around people who shared the same passion.

I actually love the community. Sure, we do get those people who are terrible people and rage at us. Great, we can mute them. Do not let those few people who are mean shadow the great individuals who motivate and befriend us. Without this game, I would never have met my best friend. He helped me through my toughest time and pushes me to pursue my dreams. And we became such good friends because we both shared a similar playstyle, while at the same time making up for each other's weaknesses, such as his over aggression with my extremely cautious laning, him being a top and jungle main whereas I am a mid, adc and support main.

I love the content (documentaries, short animations, other shows) that they develop.

I know this suddenly got all serious, but you can find me preaching this game everywhere. I used to complain about it too, especially about things that cannot change, and forget to even think about how much I love this game. About how it is literally my life. It is all I ever want to play because I feel like I belong in this community. Sure the game has its faults, and we do need to address them, yet the general state of the faulty situation is usually reasonable or cannot be changed. I hope no one takes this the wrong way. I just took my time and found just a few things I love about this game. 

What are your favorite aspects of Lol?

I had a game not too long ago with a Zac jungler that wanted to do Baron every possible instance... we were in a decent spot before he kept trying to force it, then he blamed us for not being able to clear any wards or place new wards around it before he started it. 

After the fourth attempt or so, our support pointed out that the enemy no longer needed wards at Baron to know that's where we'd be.

Junglers that obsess over Baron, even if it's a really bad idea grind my gears. You can't convince them otherwise. In fact, I had a game with this very issue not long ago.

{{champion:19}} "Hey Twitch, I know the enemy team is all up and warding all over the place, possibly on their way to kill me right now, but could you come and help me kill baron right now?"

{{champion:29}} "What? No, that's a terrible idea!"

{{champion:19}} "Report adc, useless!"

{{champion:29}} http://media.giphy.com/media/xPkQWPd9UxzXi/giphy.gif
late game {{champion:19}} can 1v1 baron
Surprisingly building a bt on pretty much any ad champ late game can let them 1v1 baron. like seriously. including adcs
ww can 1vs1 baron,takes 30 min to do so, and spamm the yellow ping if you try to help or get close to the pit...
HE CAN 1V1 BARON? This is with sated devourer right?
Many junglers can 1v1 Baron late game, with the right build.

Kindred in 5 secs,solo L{{champion:57}} 
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rahs0ur77R0]
38 passive stacks isn't really realistic in an actual game

yeah u know the first baron ever in like 35 mins of game, it isnt that strong,and the last ww had something like {{item:3930}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3065}} one of these dont recall which ( {{item:3143}}  or maybe {{item:3083}} ) and  was lvl 16 or 18

You know, as someone who jungles 90% of the time, I find that it's always laners who try to force Baron more. As a jungler it's really stressful because if I don't listen when everyone keeps pinging Baron, they'll yell at me. If I go and they all die, they'll also yell at me. #lanerlogic


I played a game the other day where we killed just the other teams jungler, and the rest of their team was up. The minions were pushed up to our base, we had an open mid inhib,  and the enemy team was rolling us in gold lead. For some unknown reason, just because we killed the jungler, my team kept pinging and rushing for Baron, and no matter how many times I told them "That's an awful idea, please, just push out and defend. We're making a comeback, no need to throw it." It was basically useless arguing with them because they were doing it whether I was there or not. So I went and bam. We all die. They push and win without even grabbing Baron because it's not important. 

Like???? Good junglers know when to take objectives, please do not force it if your jungler tells you it's an awful idea.
if only people realized how important the jungler really is..
{{champion:11}}  Fine, I'll just solo it,

POOTISPENCER HERE!...
Sorry couldnt resist

Fk That i'll SOLO,u bunch of ''scaredy cat''{{champion:1}} 

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rahs0ur77R0)
thats balanced...
I love this +1

Reminds me of a game where we had this Yi who literally thought he was carrying us even though he had twice as many deaths as any of us. He constantly got caught out trying to split push and would almost NEVER help us out in teamfights. We were at dragon and I'm pinging constantly trying to tell them to pull out drag, and we all back up, but Yi stays there AA'ing the dragon...., and so when Amumu flies over the wall with his bandage toss and ult us and then steals drag while the rest of the team ace's us, our yi actually has the nerve to say "That's why you pull out the drag you dumbfucks". WELCOME TO LOW ELOOOOOOOOO
What is the name of the video from which you made the gif?

> [{quoted}](name=computo2000,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hRH85Enr,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-10-07T16:29:30.897+0000)
>
> What is the name of the video from which you made the gif?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIWzjUD6erw

One of my favorite youtubers.

Yeah, and it seems worse after the world championship. Yesterday I had a game where we had mid and bot inhib taken out, and aced their team and they all left to do baron... We some how almost lost the game after that. You think after killing baron we would go back to base and regroup no everyone went their own way in the jungle and died so it didn't matter.
That TF2
That's OK, we aced and a guy on our team asked if he could get red before pushing.... -_-
Everyone just what a xpeke on that moment. After 12 deads they finaly succeed or lose us the game.
